Pre-Game Insights: Dallas Mavericks have a solid home record of 2-1 and a 5-1 record at home after a loss in their last six games.
Orlando Magic have struggled on the road with a 1-3 record away from home.
The Mavericks have won three of the last five meetings against the Magic, showcasing their regular season dominance.
Dallas Mavericks' starters include Luka Dončić, Kyrie Irving, and Spencer Dinwiddie, while Orlando Magic's starters include Cole Anthony, Anthony Black, Jalen Suggs, and Gary Harris.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game is scheduled at the American Airlines Center in Dallas, USA.
The article provides a historical context of the head-to-head matchups between the two teams.
